mapper.update: update SEC_AEM set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_WDD = #{fromWdd,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, RARE_FISH = #{rareFish,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ECONOMIC_FISH = #{economicFish,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, REPRO_ECOLOGY = #{reproEcology,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FISHERY_ENV = #{fisheryEnv,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, REGION, FROM_WDD, RARE_FISH, ECONOMIC_FISH, REPRO_ECOLOGY, FISHERY_ENV, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from SEC_AEM where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, REGION, FROM_WDD, RARE_FISH, ECONOMIC_FISH, REPRO_ECOLOGY, FISHERY_ENV, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from SEC_AEM
